text: Gymnastics events at the 1987 Southeast Asian Games was held between 10 September to 12 September at Senayan Convention Center. ==Medal summary== ===Men=== {| |- |All-round | Teeruch Poparnich||54.55 pts | Jonathan Sianturi||53.40 | Sunan Teinrujang||50.15 |- |Floor exercise | Prawut Sititukuthai||17.85 pts | Jonathan Sianturi||17.65 | Sergio Jasareno||17.50 |- |Horizontal bars | Jonathan Sianturi||18.500 pts | Teeruch Poparnich||18.499 | Chan Prampan||17.600 |- |Parallel bars | Teeruch Poparnich||18.450 pts | Sing Hwa Liew||17.350 | Jefri Reza Sanger||16.950 |- |Pommel horse | Prawut Sititukuthai||15.95 pts | Sergio Jasareno||15.45 | Rommel Kong||15.00 |- |Rings | Teeruch Poparnich||17.90 pts | Jonathan Sianturi||17.75 | Sunan Teinrujang||17.10 |- |Vaults | Alexander Tolentino||18.175 pts | Prawut Sititukuthai||17.850 | Sergio Jasareno||17.850 |- |Men's Team |||253.80 pts |||243.05 |||229.85 |} ===Women's=== {| |- |Individual | Bea Lucero||37.355 pts | Eva Butarbutar||36.60 | Hesty Dewayanti||36.20 |- |Balance beam | Bea Lucero||18.650 pts | Eva Butarbutar||18.100 | Hesty Dewayanti||17.750 |- |Floor Exercise | Esther Christanti||19.050 pts | Bea Lucero||18.950 | Eva Butarbutar||18.300 |- |Uneven bars | Hesty Dewayanti||18.850 pts | Woro Werdaningsih||18.200 | Jidapa Srimuang||15.900 |- |Vaults | Eva Butarbutar||19.825 pts | Bea Lucero||18.800 | Esther Christanti||18.550 |- |Women's Team |||178.10 pts |||169.80 |||152.50 |} ==Medal table== ==References== * http://eresources.nlb.gov.sg/newspapers/Digitised/Article/straitstimes19870911-1.2.56.38 * http://eresources.nlb.gov.sg/newspapers/Digitised/Article/straitstimes19870912-1.2.44.15.15 * http://eresources.nlb.gov.sg/newspapers/Digitised/Article/straitstimes19870913-1.2.43.4 Category:1987 Southeast Asian Games Southeast Asian Games 1987 Category:Gymnastics competitions in Indonesia
title: Gymnastics at the 1987 Southeast Asian Games
